header.title: Ole Oskar Heinrichs
header.subtitle: O$ka
header.description: Focused on the intersection of music and AI. Currently working in Marketing & Distribution at EuroArts and as Marketing Manager at KI-Academy. Passionate about music creation and AI advancements.

latestRelease.description: My latest track - available now on all platforms.

musicReleases.title: Music Releases
musicReleases.description: Original music releases that showcase songwriting, production, mixing, mastering, and recording techniques. I have produced most of my tracks completely on my own. A significant part of my music history can be found on SoundCloud.

youtubeCommentary.title: Music Analysis
youtubeCommentary.description: Together with producer CAS (Sound Engineering BA) and friends, we analyze various music pieces and provide in-depth insights into music production, composition techniques, and our musical influences.

euroarts.title: Assistant Marketing & Distribution
euroarts.description: Supporting marketing initiatives and distribution strategies for classical music recordings at one of Europe's premier classical music labels.
euroarts.achievement1: Assisting in digital marketing campaigns for classical music releases
euroarts.achievement2: Supporting distribution strategies across major streaming platforms
euroarts.achievement3: Collaborating with international artists and orchestras on promotional content

kiacademy.title: Marketing Manager
kiacademy.description: The KI Academy, based in the heart of Berlin, is dedicated to helping individuals and companies unlock the full potential of Artificial Intelligence (AI). Our mission is to equip learners with the tools and knowledge they need to succeed in a rapidly evolving digital world.
kiacademy.achievement1: Social Media Marketing and Online Marketing expertise
kiacademy.achievement2: Working with industry experts pushing the boundaries of AI innovation
kiacademy.achievement3: Providing cutting-edge insights and skills to students

audioEngineer.title: Audio Engineer
audioEngineer.description: Complete audiobook editing and mastering for 'Die Sieben Säulen des Seins: Von der Kunst ein erfülltes Leben zu führen - Das transformierende Praxis-Programm' using Adobe Audition.
audioEngineer.achievement3: Time management and audio engineering expertise

aboutUsRecords.title: Intern
aboutUsRecords.description: Comprehensive internship at about us records gaining deep insights into the music industry across multiple departments.
aboutUsRecords.achievement1: Music promotion and artist management experience
aboutUsRecords.achievement2: A&R experience and music production insights
aboutUsRecords.achievement3: Music distribution (physical and digital) and music law knowledge

eventOrganizer.title: Event Organizer
eventOrganizer.description: Organized a sold-out concert with multiple artists at Lido Berlin, including performing on stage myself.

education.title: Bachelor of Music, Songwriting
education.description: The BMus (Hons) Songwriting degree enables students to develop their creative abilities and acquire solid knowledge about music and industry. The course emphasizes practical learning and collaboration with industry professionals.

blog.title: Blog & Thoughts
blog.description: Content about music and AI will be available here soon.
blog.headerDescription: My thoughts and articles about music production, AI, and creative processes.
blog.noPostsWithTag: No posts with the selected tag

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.umsatzsteuerID: No VAT ID available, as this is a private website
imprint.streitbeilegungText: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS): https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr. You can find my email address in the imprint above. I am not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
imprint.haftungInhalteText: As a service provider, I am responsible for my own content on these pages in accordance with general laws according to § 7 Para.1 TMG. According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, however, as a service provider, I am not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block the use of information according to general laws remain unaffected by this. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific legal violation. Upon becoming aware of corresponding legal violations, I will remove this content immediately.
imprint.haftungLinksText: My offer contains links to external websites of third parties, the content of which I have no influence on. Therefore, I cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking. However, permanent content control of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a violation of law. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, I will remove such links immediately.
imprint.urheberrechtText: The content and works created by the site operator on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The reproduction, editing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are only permitted for private, non-commercial use. Insofar as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is identified as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform me accordingly. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, I will remove such content immediately.

cta.title: Ready to Collaborate?
cta.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities in marketing, music production, or AI integration projects. Let's connect and explore how we can work together.
